edu.wpi.grip.core.operations.network.http

Class HttpPublishOperation<D,P extends Publishable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.grip.core.operations.network.NetworkPublishOperation<D>
      • edu.wpi.grip.core.operations.network.PublishAnnotatedOperation<D,P>
        • edu.wpi.grip.core.operations.network.http.HttpPublishOperation<D,P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation

    public class HttpPublishOperation<D,P extends Publishable>
extends PublishAnnotatedOperation<D,P>
    An operation for publishing data to the internal HTTP server, from which which remote applications can request the data.
    See Also:
    GripServer
